abstract: The names of the joints in the pose in specific order.
overview:
## Discussion

Each joint name has a corresponding transformation value in [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/SkeletalPose/jointTransforms] at the same index.

Updates of the value results in resizing or reordering of the pose’s [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/SkeletalPose/jointTransforms] to match. New joint names add identity transformations at the matching indices.

# jointNames

**Instance Property**

The names of the joints in the pose in specific order.

## Declaration

```swift
var jointNames: [String] { get set }
```

## Discussion

Each joint name has a corresponding transformation value in [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/SkeletalPose/jointTransforms] at the same index.

Updates of the value results in resizing or reordering of the pose’s [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/SkeletalPose/jointTransforms] to match. New joint names add identity transformations at the matching indices.
title: jointNames
